Hi War Thunder players,
This is rank II sight pack for USSR. Sorry for taking so long to post them. If they have any problems, please comment and I will support you! And also rank I will be upload next several days!!!
If you have any problems with my sights, please contact me and I'll try to support you!
Thank you so much! Enjoy and have a good day!!!

T-54 sight "TSH-20" redone for WarThunder usage//
!!NOT REALISTIC, BUT COMFY FOR AVERAGE PLAYER!!//
#t54 #t_54 #t_54_47 #t_54_49 #t_54_51

Based on sight from here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/708194/en/

Universal sight presented in two types, large and small. Contain no unnecessary staff, fully minimalist and in general the best

To install unzip archive and move blk files from there to YourDirectory\WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks.
Press Alt + F9 to if you in battle to refresh user sights. Select the sight in options

#alltanks #universal #scope #sight

This is rank IV sight pack for USSR. If they have any problems, please comment and I'll try to fix it :D

BTR-80A sight "1PZ-9" redone for WarThunder usage//
!!NOT REALISTIC, BUT COMFY FOR AVERAGE PLAYER!!//
#btr80a #btr #btr_80_a #btr_80a

This is another simple custom sight I made for myself, and I thought I could share it...
Tell me in the comments if I should add a rangefinder in the sight, I'm not quite a RB player and I guess it might be handy for this fast scouting car!
There's just a basic circle showing the locking circle of the missiles, a square showing the radar locking cone, and a little chevron for the rangefinder.

#type93 #type_93 #sight

Heyo, just a little sight I did of the common femboy furry. I hope you all enjoy it. Feel free to give me requests in the comments so I know what to make next!

#femboy
#furry
#alltanks
#all_tanks
#cute

Hi War Thunder players,
This is a sight pack for rank V USSR included finish and unfinish sights. If they have any bugs, please comment and I'll try to fix them.
Next week rank IV will be released!
If you have any problems with my sights, please contact me and I'll try to support you!
Enjoy and have a nice day!!!

My Low profile user sight, mainly made for use in top tier tanks

The Neon green color is the basic color but for people who want to use the black color for the sight you can change it to black with the Crosshair lighting button
